body.name: Diono Radian 3R, 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat, Rear Facing & Forward Facing, 10 Years 1 Car Seat, Jet Black & Angle Adjuster Car Seat Leveler, Car Seat Wedge Cushion, Foam Provides More Legroom
deliveryMessages: Delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 7 mins
features: Product 1: STEEL CORE - Mechanically engineered, reinforced steel core, made from automotive grade high strength steel to shield and protect
Product 2: CREATES MORE SPACE IN THE FRONT SEAT - Elevates All-in-One convertible car seats to a more upright position so they can fit in smaller vehicles
body.description: Diono Radian 3R, 3-in-1 Convertible Car Seat, Rear Facing & Forward Facing, 10 Years 1 Car Seat, Slim Fit 3 Across, Jet BlackThe Diono Radian 3R is the original slim-fit 3 across All-in-One convertible car seat, designed to protect from baby to booster seat (5 - 120 lb / 2.2 - 54 kg). Lovingly engineered with the famous Diono steel reinforced frame and now rear facing for even longer, expect 10 years of safety from just one car seat. Designed and engineered with complete rear facing protection, so you can keep them in a safe rear facing convertible car seat for longer up to 50 pounds. Built with a mechanically engineered, reinforced steel frame, made from automotive grade high strength steel, the radian is always ready to shield and protect. And when your family grows, the slim-fit design will fit 3 across in most vehicles without compromising child safety or passenger comfort. Our SuperLATCH system (UAS Compatible) makes installation easy and super secure. As travel car seat experts, Diono have naturally built in super portable and convenient features to the Radian 3R with original fold for easy transport and storage and easy remove machine washable covers. The radian is also aircraft certified (FAA approved), so you can take safety with you wherever you go.Diono Angle Adjuster Car Seat Leveler, Car Seat Wedge Cushion, Foam Provides More Legroom for Rear-Facing Car SeatsKeep your infant rear facing for longer with the Diono Angle Adjuster, designed to maximise the use of our All-in-One Convertible car seats without sacrificing your little ones safety. Install in seconds by sliding underneath the seat to create a more upright angle giving more space for your child as well as extra room in the front passenger seat. Made from high density foam to support the weight of the car seat without damaging your vehicle interior, and Diono crash tested for added safety.
